document.docAuthor: Ornosa, Concepción, Torres, Félix & Rúa, Pilar De La
document.masterDocTitle: Updated list of bumblebees (Hymenoptera: Apidae) from the Spanish Pyrenees with notes on their decline and conservation status

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated list of bumblebees (Hymenoptera: Apidae) from the Spanish Pyrenees with notes on their decline and conservation status

subSubSection.paragraph:
It has been collected in forestal and supraforestal temperate oceanic Pyrenean pastures, in meadows of altitude either with scattered
Pinus uncinata
, with patches of subalpine scrub, or in peatlands, normally between
1310 and 2600
m ( Fig. 7 ), except in two cases, always above 1700 m , on
Achilegia vulgaris
L.,
Acinos alpinum
(L.),
Campanula glomerata
L.,
Carduus acanthoides
L.,
Cirsium acaule
(L.) Scop.,
Cirsium arvense
(L.) Scop.,
Echium vulgare L.
,
Epilobium angustifolium
L.,
Gentiana alpina Will.
,
Gentiana lutea
L.,
Lathyrus pratensis
L.,
Lotus corniculatus
L., Onobrichis vicifolia Scop.,
Phlomis lychnitis
L.,
Rhododendron ferrugineum L., Silene acaulis
(L.) Jacq.,
Trifolium pratense L.
,
Trifolium repens L.
Vaccinium myrtillus L.
,
Viola odorata L.
and
Vicia cracca L.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
New records. Andorra :
Soldeu ,
28-VII-2006
, 1 male , C. Ornosa leg., UCME .
